title: RITO U DO TIS AGIN
body: I know rito IS working on the game and trying to prevent the servers from crasching but somehow i feel betrayed for playing a game wich crashes so often

replies.body:
English: The servers aren´t crashing often. Back in season1/season2, they crashed a lot. But especially after the new servercentre in Amsterdam, the servers are running quiet smooth. There are rarely any serverproblems. So in many, nearly all, cases the problems are caused by the user and his hard- and software himself.

Deutsch: Die Server crashen nicht oft. Damals in Season1/Season2 sind sie oft gecrashed. Aber besonders nach dem neuen Serverzentrum in Amsterdam laufen sie Server sehr rund. Es gibt selten Serverprobleme. So in den meisten, fast allen, Fällen liegen die Probleme beim Anwender und seiner Hard- und Software selbst.
